channel.title: Prototyping on CHLA team blog
channel.description: Recent content in Prototyping on CHLA team blog

item.title: Week 5: Pivots & Prototyping
item.description: This week the process of prototyping our new mini games is in full swing. After speaking with Professor Marientina & Dr. Vangelis our mini games have pivoted a bit to the following: name description inhale exhale Sailboat game You’re the wind slow down accelarate Pebbles & Fruit Knock fruit down from the trees collect a pebble blow pebble at fruit Save the Village Be the enemy or the savior collect air/water spray fire/water Building the scene
